mapper.select: select product_no,product_category,product_name,xs,s,m,l,xl from product_stock left join product using(product_no) order by product_no desc
select product_no,product_category,product_name,xs,s,m,l,xl from product_stock left join product using(product_no) where product_no=#{product_no}
update product_stock set xs=#{xs}, s=#{s}, m=#{m}, l=#{l}, xl=#{xl} where product_no=#{product_no}
select product_no,product_category,product_name,xs,s,m,l,xl from product_stock left join product using(product_no) where product_category=#{product_category} order by product_no desc
